Hydras:

Hydras arrived at the command room and watched at his troops and inspec them 
carefully as if he was pondering something and said to Cyclonus "How many 
bots do you need to speed up the repairs and upgrades? minimal 
requierements"

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Monday, June 20, 2011 11:11 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Hydras and Predacons

> <OLD>
>
> "My orders will depends of the troops that are in good shape" said Hydras
> whiloe he watched all the rebuilt that it must be done before to that 
> place
> was fully fuctional "Priorities, you know."
>

<NEW>

CYCLONUS nodded as he walked with his commander. �At the moment all
units have reported functional and ready.� CYCLONUS looked over at
HYDRAS, �That is everyone except Terrorsaur. We have not been able to
locate him.�

Continuing to walk in silence for a moment, CYCLONUS broke it as
another part of the update came to him, �Our examination of the battle
we were picking up on scanners was inconclusive. By the time our
forces arrived there was nothing left to find. No bodies and no real
evidence except for the damage done to the foliage and such. However
there was some sort of alien presence there, as well as Unicronian.�
CYCLONUS pursed his lips thoughtfully, �And one of the sweeps believes
that he detected a single Predacon signature.�

As HYDRAS and CYCLONUS walked, the work on the base was becoming more
and more evident. Lights and power appeared to be all over the ship.
Doors easily responded to their presence, chirping once as it
identified their predacon signature and noted their name and rank. The
holes in the walls were no longer present, and that smell of smoke and
charred parts was noticeably absent.

They came to a stop to the doors of the hanger bay, through the doors
HYDRAS could see all nearly all of the soldiers in there next room,
milling around. DEEPSTRYKE was standing to the front keeping an optic
on things as BLACKRAZOR and PHOBIA both watched from the sides.

Behind them stood nearly the rest of the crew: INSECTICON, BRUTICUS-X
, IGUANUS stood together while TARANTULUS stood next to FRACTYL
whispering something sly into his ear. INFERNO kept glancing at the
door as if waiting for HYDRAS to appear.

In another section the Fuzors stood. SKYSHADOW their leader and
INJECTOR, BUZZCLAW, TERRORGATOR,  and QUICKSTRIKE. Standing in the
middle of it all stood WASPINATOR he looked somewhat alone without
TERRASAUR there to talk to.

CYCLONUS looked at HYDRAS, �I have Scourge in the security section
keeping watch on our external defenses and the three remaining sweep
are flying perimeter watch. Other than that all of your soldiers are
here.�

Gesturing at the door CYCLONUS nodded, �After you sir.�

(TAG)

Preston
